name: Fire Jam, Return the Flames
description:
My game is about you a hero summoned from another world to help the village of foxes from an evil wizard who stole their magical fires that keep evil away. You must save the day before the world freezes over.

The controls:    Arrow keys for movement,       Space for jump

My game is about a little town being attacked by an evil wizard. The evil wizard has taken the sacred flames from the town causing the area to become a snowy ice land. The town summons a hero to kill the evil wizard and return the sacred flames back to the town before it is too late.

I was trying to make the longest side scroll game that I ever made and trying to make more details in the game.
